Package ca.sheridancollege.controllers

Class HomeController

java.lang.Object
ca.sheridancollege.controllers.HomeController
@Controller
public class HomeController
extends java.lang.Object
This is a Spring Controller. The controller annotation ensures that the spring framework recognize this class as "Something it must manage".

asra.k

  • Method Details

    • goHome

      @GetMapping("/") public java.lang.String goHome​(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @ModelAttribute Mission mission)
      This method will be used by the framework whenever there is a request for the root of the web site.
      Parameters:
      model - Model object supplied by MVC
      mission - an instance of model that can be used to send data back and forward .html
      Returns:
      index an html file marked with thymeleaf

    • createMission

      @GetMapping("/createMission") public java.lang.String createMission​(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @ModelAttribute Mission mission)
      Method used by the frame work when their is a request for create mission.
      Parameters:
      model - Model object supplied by MVC.
      mission - a special instance with the values user entered.
      Returns:
      create_mission form page to create mission.

    • addMission

      @GetMapping("/addMission") public java.lang.String addMission​(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @ModelAttribute Mission mission)
      this page is requested by the frame work when a mission is created to add a new mission.
      Parameters:
      model - Model object passed by MVC
      Returns:
      redirect:/createMisison .Redirects the request to the create mission page

    • viewMissions

      @GetMapping("/viewMission") public java.lang.String viewMissions​(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @RequestParam java.lang.String agent)
      this page is requested by the framework when a request for view mission for an agent is requested
      Parameters:
      model - model Model object passed by MVC
      agent - Agent selected
      Returns:
      view_mission

    • updateMission

      @PostMapping("/updateMission") public java.lang.String updateMission​(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @ModelAttribute Mission mission)
      this will show the updated list of missions
      Parameters:
      model - it will update the mission
      mission - it will update
      Returns:
      returns view mission. where update list

    • editMission

      @GetMapping("/editMission/{id}") public java.lang.String editMission​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      the details of the mission created previously can be edited.
      Parameters:
      id - it will be the last element in the URL path.
      model - it will store mission here for binding
      Returns:
      return edit_mission .

    • deleteMission

      @GetMapping("/deleteMission/{id}") public java.lang.String deleteMission​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Mission that was created previously can be deleted.
      Parameters:
      id - id it will be the last element in the URL path.
      model - it will delete the mission
      Returns:
      view_mission. it will shows all the updated mission.
